name: 2 Red 2 Furious
description:
2 Red 2 Furious

2 Red 2 Furious is the long awaited sequel to the hit game, "Red: The Hardest Game in the World." In this game you will control a character named "Blue" a fellow Erythrophobic. Try not to touch the color red as you jump your way through endless gameplay.

While the instructions are explained in the game, I put them here too:

 -  Use arrow keys or "WASD" to move

 -  You will always be jumping 

 -  Use the Up arrow (or "w") to slow your fall

 -  Use the down arrow (or "s") to dive down

 -  Avoid the color red at all costs

 -  Stay alive for as long as possible for a higher score

 -  If you find any bugs, don't worry they are intentional

Credits:

 -  I made the graphics in Piskelapp. 

 -  I used the color palette called "Wacky World" from lospec.

 - The 2 Red 2 Furious logo was created in Photoshop by yours truly

 -  I created all the code using scratch

 -  Main Menu Theme: "Airman's Theme" from MegaMan2

 -  Gameplay Them: An 8-Bit version of the Doom Theme

 -  I made the sounds myself in FXSR

 -  Thanks for reading this BTW
